trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Set-ExecutionPolicy
trans-unit.target: Set-ExecutionPolicy

trans-unit.source: Set-ExecutionPolicy
trans-unit.target: Set-ExecutionPolicy

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Changes the user preference for the Windows PowerShell execution policy.
trans-unit.target: 更改 Windows PowerShell 执行策略的用户首选项。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Set-ExecutionPolicy** cmdlet changes the user preference for the Windows PowerShell execution policy.
trans-unit.target: **Set-executionpolicy** cmdlet 更改 Windows PowerShell 执行策略的用户首选项。

trans-unit.source: The execution policy is part of the security strategy of Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 执行策略是 Windows PowerShell 的安全策略的一部分。

trans-unit.source: It determines whether you can load configuration files (including your Windows PowerShell profile) and run scripts, and it determines which scripts, if any, must be digitally signed before they will run.
trans-unit.target: 它确定你是否能够加载配置文件（包括 Windows PowerShell 配置文件）和运行脚本，并确定哪些脚本（如果有）在运行之前必须对其进行数字签名。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Execution_Policies (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135170).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Execution_Policies (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135170)。

trans-unit.source: To change the execution policy for the default (LocalMachine) scope, start Windows PowerShell with the "Run as administrator" option.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改默认 (LocalMachine) 作用域的执行策略，请使用“以管理员身份运行”选项启动 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Set the shell execution policy
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 将 shell 执行策略设置

trans-unit.source: This command sets the user preference for the shell execution policy to RemoteSigned.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将 shell 执行策略的用户首选项设置为 RemoteSigned。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Set a shell execution policy that conflicts with the group policy
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 将通过组策略冲突 shell 执行策略设置

trans-unit.source: This command attempts to set the execution policy for the shell to Restricted.
trans-unit.target: 此命令会尝试将 shell 执行策略设置为 Restricted。

trans-unit.source: The Restricted setting is written to the registry, but because it conflicts with a group policy, it is not effective, even though it is more restrictive than the group policy.
trans-unit.target: 受限制的设置写入到注册表中，但是因为它与组策略冲突，它不是有效，即使它是比组策略更严格。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Apply the execution policy from a remote computer to the local computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 将远程计算机中的执行策略应用到本地计算机

trans-unit.source: This command gets the execution policy from a remote computer and applies that execution policy to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取远程计算机上的执行策略，并将该执行策略应用于本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Invoke-Command cmdlet to send the command to the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 将命令发送到远程计算机。

trans-unit.source: Because you can pipe an ExecutionPolicy (Microsoft.PowerShell.ExecutionPolicy) object to **Set-ExecutionPolicy**, the **Set-ExecutionPolicy** command does not require an *ExecutionPolicy* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因为可以通过管道将 ExecutionPolicy (Microsoft.PowerShell.ExecutionPolicy) 对象 **Set-executionpolicy**, 、 **Set-executionpolicy** 命令不需要 *ExecutionPolicy* 参数。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the *Force* parameter to suppress the user prompt.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 *强制* 参数来取消用户提示。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Set the scope for an execution policy
trans-unit.target: 示例 4︰ 设置执行策略的作用域

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to set an execution policy for a particular scope.
trans-unit.target: 此示例显示了如何为特定作用域设置执行策略。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the **Set-ExecutionPolicy** cmdlet to set an execution policy of **AllSigned** for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用 **Set-executionpolicy** cmdlet 设置执行策略为 **AllSigned** 为当前用户。

trans-unit.source: It uses the *Force* parameter to suppress the user prompt.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 *强制* 参数来取消用户提示。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Remove the execution policy for the current user
trans-unit.target: 示例 5︰ 删除当前用户的执行策略

trans-unit.source: This command uses an execution policy value of Undefined to effectively remove the execution policy that is set for the current user scope.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用未定义的执行策略值有效地删除为当前用户范围设置的执行策略。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the execution policy that is set in Group Policy or in the LocalMachine (all users) scope is effective.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在组策略或 LocalMachine（所有用户）作用域内设置的执行策略是有效的。

trans-unit.source: If you set the execution policy in all scopes to Undefined and the Group Policy is not set, the default execution policy, Restricted, is effective for all users of the computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义的所有作用域设置执行策略和组策略未设置，默认执行策略，Restricted，是对计算机的所有用户有效。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Set the execution policy for the current session
trans-unit.target: 示例 6︰ 为当前会话设置执行策略

trans-unit.source: This command sets an execution policy of AllSigned for only the current Windows PowerShell session.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将 AllSigned 执行策略设置仅对当前 Windows PowerShell 会话。

trans-unit.source: This execution policy is saved in the PSExecutionPolicyPreference environment variable ($env:PSExecutionPolicyPreference), so it does not affect the value in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 此执行策略将保存在 PSExecutionPolicyPreference 环境变量 ($env: PSExecutionPolicyPreference)，因此它不影响注册表中的值。

trans-unit.source: The variable and its value are deleted when the current session is closed.
trans-unit.target: 关闭当前会话时，会删除该变量及其值。

trans-unit.source: Example 7: Unblock a script to run it without changing the execution policy
trans-unit.target: 示例 7︰ 取消阻止脚本运行而无需更改执行策略

trans-unit.source: This example shows the effect of the RemoteSigned execution policy, which prevents you from running unsigned scripts that were downloaded from the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示 RemoteSigned 执行策略阻止你运行未签名的脚本从 Internet 下载的效果。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to use the Unblock-File cmdlet to unblock scripts, so that you can run them without changing the execution policy.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用 Unblock-file cmdlet 取消阻止脚本，以便可以运行这些测试而无需更改执行策略。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -ExecutionPolicy
trans-unit.target: -ExecutionPolicy

trans-unit.source: Specifies the new execution policy.
trans-unit.target: 指定新的执行策略。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are:
trans-unit.target: 此参数的可接受的值是：

trans-unit.source: Restricted.
trans-unit.target: 受限制。

trans-unit.source: Does not load configuration files or run scripts.
trans-unit.target: 不加载配置文件或运行脚本。

trans-unit.source: Restricted is the default execution policy.
trans-unit.target: 受限制的是默认执行策略。

trans-unit.source: AllSigned.
trans-unit.target: AllSigned。

trans-unit.source: Requires that all scripts and configuration files be signed by a trusted publisher, including scripts that you write on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 要求所有脚本和配置文件都由受信任的发布者签名，包括在本地计算机上编写的脚本。

trans-unit.source: RemoteSigned.
trans-unit.target: RemoteSigned。

trans-unit.source: Requires that all scripts and configuration files downloaded from the Internet be signed by a trusted publisher.
trans-unit.target: 要求从 Internet 下载的所有脚本和配置文件都由受信任的发布者签名。

trans-unit.source: Unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Loads all configuration files and runs all scripts.
trans-unit.target: 加载所有配置文件并运行所有脚本。

trans-unit.source: If you run an unsigned script that was downloaded from the Internet, you are prompted for permission before it runs.
trans-unit.target: 如果运行从 Internet 下载的未签名脚本，则系统将提示你需要权限才能运行该脚本。

trans-unit.source: Bypass.
trans-unit.target: 跳过。

trans-unit.source: Nothing is blocked and there are no warnings or prompts.
trans-unit.target: 不阻止任何操作，并且没有任何警告或提示。

trans-unit.source: Undefined.
trans-unit.target: 未定义。

trans-unit.source: Removes the currently assigned execution policy from the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 从当前作用域中删除当前分配的执行策略。

trans-unit.source: This parameter will not remove an execution policy that is set in a Group Policy scope.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不会删除在组策略作用域中设置的执行策略。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Suppresses all prompts.
trans-unit.target: 禁止显示所有提示。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Set-ExecutionPolicy** displays a warning whenever you change the execution policy.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， **Set-executionpolicy** 每当更改执行策略时显示一条警告。

trans-unit.source: -Scope
trans-unit.target: 作用域

trans-unit.source: Specifies the scope of the execution policy.
trans-unit.target: 指定执行策略的作用域。

trans-unit.source: The default is LocalMachine.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 LocalMachine。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are:
trans-unit.target: 此参数的可接受的值是：

trans-unit.source: Process: The execution policy affects only the current Windows PowerShell process.
trans-unit.target: 过程︰ 执行策略影响只是当前 Windows PowerShell 进程。

trans-unit.source: CurrentUser: The execution policy affects only the current user.
trans-unit.target: CurrentUser︰ 执行策略只影响当前用户。

trans-unit.source: LocalMachine: The execution policy affects all users of the computer.
trans-unit.target: LocalMachine︰ 执行策略会影响计算机的所有用户。

trans-unit.source: To remove an execution policy from a particular scope, set the execution policy for that scope to Undefined.
trans-unit.target: 若要从特定的作用域中删除执行策略，请将该作用域的执行策略设置为 Undefined。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the *Scope* parameter is Process, the execution policy is saved in the PSExecutionPolicyPreference environment variable ($env:PSExecutionPolicyPreference), instead of the registry, and the variable is deleted when the process is closed.
trans-unit.target: 时的值 *作用域* 参数为进程时，执行策略将保存在 PSExecutionPolicyPreference 环境变量 ($env: PSExecutionPolicyPreference) 而不是注册表中，而该变量时关闭该进程将被删除。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the execution policy of the process by editing the variable.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过编辑变量来更改进程的执行策略。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.PowerShell.ExecutionPolicy, System.String
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.PowerShell.ExecutionPolicy System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe an execution policy object or a string that contains the name of an execution policy to **Set-ExecutionPolicy**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道将执行策略对象或字符串，其中包含执行策略更改为名称 **Set-executionpolicy**。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not return any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 不返回任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: When you use **Set-ExecutionPolicy** in any scope other than Process, the new user preference is saved in the registry and remains unchanged until you change it.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 **Set-executionpolicy** 在进程外的任何范围内，新用户首选项保存在注册表中，并在更改之前保持不变。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the *Scope* parameter is Process, the user preference is stored in the PSExecutionPolicyPreference environment variable ($env:PSExecutionPolicyPreference), instead of the registry, and it is deleted when the session in which it is effective is closed.
trans-unit.target: 时的值 *作用域* 参数是过程、 用户首选项存储在 PSExecutionPolicyPreference 环境变量 ($env: PSExecutionPolicyPreference)，而不是注册表中，但它是有效的会话关闭时，删除。

trans-unit.source: If the "Turn on Script Execution" group policy is enabled for the computer or user, the user preference is saved, but it is not effective, and Windows PowerShell displays a message explaining the conflict.
trans-unit.target: 如果在计算机或用户启用了"启用脚本执行"组策略，保存用户首选项，但不是有效，和 Windows PowerShell 会显示一条消息，解释该冲突。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use **Set-ExecutionPolicy** to override a Group Policy, even if the user preference is more restrictive than the policy.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用 **Set-executionpolicy** 重写组策略，即使用户首选项的限制性比策略。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: Get-AuthenticodeSignature

trans-unit.target: Get-ExecutionPolicy

trans-unit.target: Set-AuthenticodeSignature

trans-unit.target: about_Execution_Policies
